name: Looking for Dove
description:
It's mating season, and some birds just aren't very good at building nests..
Help these silly birds build the perfect nest to attract their ideal partner!

This game was made for Mix and Game Jam 2020, in 48 hours.
Looking For Dove is a dating simulator/construction genres combination!

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
Press E to interact with objects
Hold down left click to charge your throw

JestyJam- Programmer and fantastic pun maker
Bee Cottle- 3D modelling, animation and awesome hair-haver
Iseris - Other programmer and landscaping fanatic
Chloe Motley- 2D and UI artist, texture artist and bird fan
